title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.23 - Berth usage; ship's documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.23 - Berth usage; ship's documents

State Regulations

The master of any watercraft berthed at a terminal shall, upon demand, exhibit the enrollment, license or other document of such
watercraft showing tonnage; and the owner, agent, manager or master of any
watercraft shall, upon demand, furnish a copy of the manifest or bills of
lading for cargo discharged and loaded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
